alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 2:28PM PST until January 16 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Quincy, Winchester, Waterville, Ephrata, Odessa, Ralston, Mansfield, Lamona, Othello, Moses Lake, Coulee City, Spokane, Wilbur, Electric City, Harrington, Davenport, Grand Coulee, Creston, Stratford, Palisades, Ritzville, and Coulee Dam. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to Noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Near freezing temperatures will result in slick roadway and sidewalk surfaces. Conditions may change rapidly.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Roads may have patches of ice.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau
